entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
